attributes.action: Support Theresa May's withdrawal deal so the UK can leave the EU on May 22nd.
attributes.additional_details: I suggest that Theresa May's withdrawal deal is the hardest Brexit that it's possible to get the EU to agree to. It's a compromise, but the only way to get a harder Brexit is no-deal, which has a lot of serious disadvantages. It would be helpful to show the MPs how much public support there actually is for the TM deal.
attributes.background: The MPs of the UK Parliament refuse to vote through the withdrawal deal that Theresa May negotiated with the EU. We want to let the MPs know that we the public support her deal.
